overview: Bert, a pitcher for a baseball team in a small town, is given the opportunity to try out for a team in the big leagues. Unfortunately, he incurs the enmity of McRae, the league's leading home-run hitter. In addition, he falls for the team owner's daughter, who McRae has designs on.
tagline: All the thrills of a world series! A baseball love story dramatized in sound as well as sight.
title: Warming Up
